website_summaries.verdict: Well-constructed and attractive, with plenty of toasting options, yet its overall performance is so-so, with uneven toasting a frequent issue.
pros: Fits bagels and wider breads without a problem
Specialty settings like defrost, plus a Euro-style setting that allows users to have their toast done on one side, the way Sting likes it
cons: The control level is this Smeg’s greatest weakness, with a tendency to break after a short period of use
Heating elements are often not well-calibrated, leading to burnt toast at low settings

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great toaster but I guess they ran short on the letter "S". Haha
customer_reviews.author: DCW

customer_reviews.title: Despite the fact that this was a pricey toaster, ...
customer_reviews.text: Despite the fact that this was a pricey toaster, after six months the toaster stopped working - one of the heating elements stopped heating and the lever that goes up and down with the toast stopped catching so you couldn't put the toast down. I am sending it back but it's definitely overpriced and unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Greenwald

customer_reviews.title: it's a beautifully constructed toaster
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically, it's a beautifully constructed toaster. Functionality is the problem. We tried one, went through the break-in instructions, and it still burned every piece of toast, even on the lowest setting. We sent it back and received a replacement, and it did not burn every piece of toast, but it was unbelievably inconsistent. Burn one, put one in after that and it didn't toast well, with no change in settings. Nice looking, but didn't toast properly.
customer_reviews.author: Budd

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful toaster, ugly cord
customer_reviews.text: I like this toaster a lot, but I took one star off because it simply isn’t worth $150. It toasts really well, like it was toasted in the oven and just makes the bread delicious. It looks nice and it’s well made. My only dislike is that the cord is pretty industrial grade looking. It’s thick and gray, and doesn’t coil around the base very easily (there’s a hidden cord coil spot on the base of the toaster, which is nice.) I got the cream color.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse E.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it for looks only- it's NOT worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed that this toaster didn't last more than 2 months... about 1 loaf of bread toasted in my house TOTAL. The center toasting board just shorted out. Huge WASTE of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Robust, well-made toaster
customer_reviews.text: In a class of its own. Pros: mint green pastel is understated and beautiful. Toaster feels substantial. Power cord is heavy duty. Excellent packaging and wrapping. You do get what you pay for. This toaster replaces another retro that I got last year that made ok toast but was very flimsy. Big difference between the 2 toasters in quality. I made a perfect bagel tonight. Con: for $149 you only get a 1 year warranty. Should be at least 3-5. Love this appliance, it's definitely the toast of the town. I'll revise this review if it doesn't hold up, but I have a high expectation that it will.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: A solid toaster that looks good on your counters
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my wife who was eyeing this toaster for a while but wasn't sure as it's pretty darn expensive for a mere toaster. Well, I have had this toaster for over a month and it is solidly built. Very solid. The button and lever will last a long time. Cleaning the crumbs out is easy. If you don't store your toaster away and plan to keep it in plain view, then this toaster is a good choice. It looks really stylish. The only strange thing is the silly company name, but I guess it's an Italian company that's been around since the 1940s.
customer_reviews.author: DCGeek1

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: This toaster meets 2 criteria I have: 1). The functionality is excellent and 2). It is retro & awesome looking. I put bagels in there and they fit perfectly. It toasts the bread really well and even left pretty toaster marks. I'm pleased with this purchase. It's worth the extra money. The mint green color is gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: T. Parvin

customer_reviews.title: Toasted only one side of bread
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Smeg toaster because I thought I was getting a high quality toaster. I also loved the retro style. We probably toasted 10 pieces of toast when it broke. It would toast just one side of the bread. Very disappointing. I'm returning.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Dwyer Noonan

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 18 months
customer_reviews.text: I paid the outrageous price of $150 for a toaster, because it was so cute and looked perfect in my kitchen. I was very happy with it until it stopped working (no heating and lever would not go down). I called SMEG USA to see where I could take it to be repaired. The representative told me that they generally don't repair them, but replace them! I am shortly out of the warranty period so I am out of luck. This is ridiculously poor quality for an expensive item.
customer_reviews.author: qbee

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: after warrantee was over it broke down stopped working.. I called smeg they said its out of warrantee have a nice day..i paid half for a Cuisinart with double toaster.. I have it now for over 6 years..still going.. so u don't always get what u pay for.. smeg is nice looking but that's all it is. one year is to short of a warrantee for the money they charge save your money buy something better
customer_reviews.author: angelo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful appliance
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a fairly well made appliance. It is absolutely beautiful. The quality of the fit and finish is outstanding. It is definitely a statement piece for a kitchen. Not sure it makes toast any better than a $50-60 toaster, but this is more of a furnishing or art piece than just a toaster that you pull out of the cupboard every now and then. If you have copper accents in your house I would highly recommend adding this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Happy

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 3 years and no one will repair it, including the company
customer_reviews.text: I loved this toaster. It's retro look and color is perfect in my kitchen. We use it every single day. A couple of months ago, the outer heating elements stopped working. It is time consuming having to flip the toast and make sure it's completely done, especially in the busy rush of getting 3 kids ready for school. I called Smeg and they said because it's older than a year, it cannot be replaced. Since repairs are so costly and hardly anyone repairs toasters anymore, they recommend just replacing it. I am so disappointed. Especially since this happened with such an expensive toaster. I will not be buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this cute toaster but it does not toast well at all. The toasting is uneven. One side will get really dark and the other side will be light. It’s very inconsistent. I am really disappointed considering how much this cost. The photo is the same piece of toast. It also shot the toast up so high it landed on the counter. Returning ASAP! Not worth the cost whatsoever. For $150 I expect toast perfection. Edit: I missed the return window because of the corona virus pandemic. I’m not happy. The window should be extended.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. E

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, solid. Use lower temperature settings.
customer_reviews.text: This toaster replaced a tired ancient Tefal in a redesigned kitchen that fit its Italian Styling. What you get is solid (heavy and polished) and eye-catching. The settings work well IF you use the lower temperature settings until you are familiar with its power. The defrost feature works well on frozen slices, adding about 1.5 upticks on the dial selection. The defroster rids moisture from the frozen item. Cleaning tray is easy to empty and the surface wipes off nicely. Yes, it is a pricey appliance, but so far it has functioned very well.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Segal

customer_reviews.title: Love this toaster!
customer_reviews.text: I know this is a lot for a toaster. I wanted the fridge and settled for the toaster. I even got one for my daughter as a house warming gift. She loves it too. It’s sturdy, easy to clean and works better and faster than any other toaster I’ve ever had. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Lusk

customer_reviews.title: Not only is cute, but is quality
customer_reviews.text: After suffering for years with cute but poorly built toasters, we finally pulled the trigger on this Smeg unit. It was cute but would it be quality? Yes, everything from the feel of the plunger going down to the construction of the slot guides, this unit is a 8 out of 10 as far as quality. So pretty much as much as I want to spend. The packaging was good, the instruction manual clear with a couple of additional options that could be made. Overall, I am tickled pink by this new stylish addition to our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Rotrow

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Can't judge durability - brand new - but so far so very good. Very quirky appearance which is OK with me. Makes great toast in a short period of time - what else is it good for - read the manual. I'm very pleased with this toaster and if I need other appliances I will look to this product line first.
customer_reviews.author: harriet forman, RN, EdD

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love.....
customer_reviews.text: I was attracted to your sleekness and beautiful shape. I found myself thinking about you every day. I hesitated to commit. Seriously though, this is a wonderful product. Superbly designed, sturdy and well made. The level of attention to detail is great, I particularly like that you can easily shorten the cord. But it's a toaster right? Yes it is, and it is possibly the best ever. It makes perfect toast. It toasts one side of a bagel, it defrosts and toasts. It's worth the money......and it's beautiful. I'm in love.
customer_reviews.author: margaret ladd

customer_reviews.title: Broke before a year, and NO costumer support- "Great Household"
customer_reviews.text: The toaster performed ok for about 10 months. It is somewhat inconsistent in toasting, but I could live with that because it looked good in my kitchen. However, it broke (center filaments do not work) in less than a year. And Great Household who sold me the product through Amazon has not wanted to fix the problem. I would not buy from them, and I would get a different toaster that would last longer, or at least be cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, still doesn't toast like a pricey toaster should
customer_reviews.text: This toaster looks fabulous and makes me happy to look at, but the reviews suggesting it toasts unevenly are correct. One side of the bread always toasts more. Yes, I can just rotate the bread halfway through toasting, but that stinks for the price. I'll keep you posted as to how long the toaster works, as some other reviews suggest the toaster dies within a few months. Seems toaster technology hasn't been improved upon in 40 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter picked this toaster out. For a toaster I think it's too expensive but she loves this brand and the color that goes with her Mixer. In the beginning she picked out the wrong color that I ordered and I had it returned and replaced with the blue. Fast delivery and well packed. She loves the toaster.
customer_reviews.author: ISC

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful toaster that does not toast properly
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my 20-year-old $30 toaster because I was having to turn the bread to get it to toast properly on each side. Low and behold, this lovely $150 SMEG toaster is NO better, AND burns one side of the toast no matter what setting I use. Fully intend to return. I can't understand, after looking more carefully at the reviews, how this product has 4 1/2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Young

customer_reviews.title: What a mess
customer_reviews.text: We received an obviously returned toaster with fingerprints on it. The color is much more green than the bluish green pictures. Kitchen Kapers said they could not help us because we didn't order directly from them, and then Amazon would not let us leave packaging feedback because it was supposedly sent from Kitchen Kapers.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B

customer_reviews.title: Coolest toaster ever
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I know that for a toaster this is a bit spendy but if you are into retro this one is great - dial lights up when toasting and does a great job. I mean it's toast - not rocket science, it's not going to do your taxes but it is pretty awesome - we are pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Margy

customer_reviews.title: burns everything after only 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I thought that if I paid 150. for a toaster that it might last a while, 2 years is not very long and the stupid thing burns everything on the first setting. Toaster looks great, but that's it. So it you want a great looking toaster that you probably should never use, this is the ticket for you. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Alma Jean Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Beware of lever not staying down
customer_reviews.text: We obviously love the look of this toaster, that's why most people buy it, us included. We like the features like the bagel option and half step values. We didn't have any issues with the toaster burning at lower value numbers like others, but we do have MAJOR issues with the lever. After a few months, the lever wouldn't stay down rendering it useless. After some research, we found articles on how to open it up and clean the contacts. This did the tricks for a couple months, until now, when we're back in the same boat only a year after purchasing. We use it daily, but we also regularly clean out the crumb tray. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Hoiten

customer_reviews.title: Fine Workmanship
customer_reviews.text: This is a well built toaster that really provides a pop to any kitchen. This is not some cheaply constructed toaster and you can feel the quality when making your first piece of toast or bagel. The retro look bring a conservation piece that everyone will be asking where you bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for bagels!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color! It seems very solid. I’ve made bagels and toast with it so far. Due to some other reviews I’ve kept it on the low setting, which has worked well. The “1.5” setting seems to be the perfect setting for medium-toasted.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan Foshe

customer_reviews.title: The Queen of Toasters
customer_reviews.text: It’s red, has big slots for bread, can cook a bagel to perfection, everything pops up to the level that you can pluck out your toast with your fingers and not a fork. The color is sublime. It’s a fun addition to our black, white ad red kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Fingal

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: The cutest and most high quality toaster I’ve ever had! I’ve wanted it for a while, but the price was always a deterrent. I finally just bought it and honestly have no regrets, it’s adorable and my toast is perfect every single time, what more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Norah Evans

customer_reviews.title: Uneven toasting
customer_reviews.text: One side is almost burnt, and the other side is not even brown
customer_reviews.author: xy

customer_reviews.title: ****ALMOST BURNED MY HOUSE DOWN****
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this toaster at all! I have only used it a handful of times. Purchased on September 30th. On Christmas morning we used it and had it on setting #2. It did not pop up when it was supposed to and continued to burn the toast. We didn't notice until the toaster was almost on fire and our alarms were set off. This is unacceptable for such an expensive toaster. They initially refused to return it as it was out of the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Kind Clean Co

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Toaster, and pretty too!
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is Awesome! I am not one to waste funds as they are hard to come by, But this machine is well made and does what the ads said it would and it's pretty as all get out! I would recommend it to anyone who wants toast or Bagels done nicely. One fantastic machine!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean, makes perfect toast every time. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Light Usage, Didn't Last Two Years
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this toaster maybe two years, it's been lightly used. Went to toast an English Muffin and nothing happened. The lever isn't catching the tray to engage the heating element. My old toaster, I purchased for $10 & it lasted nearly a decade then I replaced it with this counter ornament?! It does look nice but don't purchase if you want anything more than a pretty face or...toast.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Omg I’m in love! It’s super cute and does the job. So happy I picked this toaster!
customer_reviews.author: Ahmay22

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's meant to do and it's beautifully made.
customer_reviews.text: We are in love with the retro style of this toaster and the color is perfect for our kitchen. Our toast comes out nicely toasted and the lever to drop the toast feels like quality. The settings are easy and not cluttered and complex like other toasters you can receive at this price. It's good at what it's meant to do yet it's gorgeous and shines in the kitchen. All of our guests always comment on our toaster!
customer_reviews.author: A. Kwon

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Looks so cute on my counter space. Toasts bread evenly on both sides and will toast brown on the #1. If you select the bagel button then it will only brown on one side. The other button is for defrost only. LOVE this product. My daughter wants one in pink for her place.
customer_reviews.author: Td

customer_reviews.title: This toaster rocks!
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love? Super cute - works easily and well. Looks awesome in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Dyanna

customer_reviews.title: One sharp appliance.
customer_reviews.text: It’s really sharp looking, and it’s heavy so it doesn’t feel cheap. Very well packed. I was unable to use it because my wife went a little crazy over the price $165. for a toaster. I have to send it back not knowing how it toasts. Sorry RMB
customer_reviews.author: The WHITE ALBUM

customer_reviews.title: Paying only for the name
customer_reviews.text: This really isn't a toaster, as much as bread warmer or destroyer of loaves (there's no middle ground - it's either warm bread or charcoaled bread). It's expensive and it looks cool, and it has the brand name on it, but really, you'd need to be a Smeg Head to truly appreciate it. If you like actual toast, instead of just warmed up bread, skip this and buy a Dualit. My Smeg toaster lasted about 16 months before I made the decision to upgrade to the Dualit.
customer_reviews.author: Odin@FF

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: We love our Smeg. Many modern appliances are cheaply made and are mostly plastic, this toaster is the real deal manufactured with powder coated metals and quality construction.
customer_reviews.author: Reid

customer_reviews.title: Funky retro makes perfect toast.
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster! Its retro design adds a colorful splash to the kitchen. The sturdy, well made, simple mechanics makes perfect toast every time. Regular medium toast with wholewheat grainy bread usually require a setting of 2. The toaster arrived quickly and was extremely well packed with good instructions. Also ordered the grill rack for for making grilled sandwiches. Makes perfect grilled cheese with minimal clean up. Well worth the high price.
customer_reviews.author: DONOHUE

customer_reviews.title: Do I really deserve toast this perfectly browned?
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought all of the reviews were rationalizing the purchase of an expensive toaster. And while this was not the MOST expensive I looked at, the general pleasure exuded by the other purchasers led me to buy it. And like them, I am very pleased indeed! Frankly, I've never seen such evenly toasted bread. I almost feel like I don't deserve the excellence of the toast it produces. I wish every appliance I purchased worked so well!
customer_reviews.author: TravelGal

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after we remodeled our kitchen and thought the color was perfect (it was). Love the simplicity and great quality of this toaster. The whole family likes it and I think it was money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: ntuck

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and does the job well
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and does the job well.?if I could snuggle my toaster at night (with out being perceived as weird - and if it was not so cold and stiff), I would. Every time I come in the house, this little beauty is sitting on the counter greeting me. Making toast was never so chic! Easy to operate. Toast seems to cook evenly. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Smith

customer_reviews.title: An Aqua Toaster!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much!! I bought a new house and the kitchen is my least favorite color--BROWN!! I had to have some color in there... XO for this stylish toaster!!
customer_reviews.author: Manhattan Beach

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job Well
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is the real deal. Solid construction, easy to use, and it looks extraordinarily good on the kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G.

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my smeg white toaster. It’s the best thing I’ve bought for myself. It’s gorgeous stylish and works great. I’ve read so many bad reviews about it and I was so hesitant to buy it but I ended up giving it a try and I’m so happy I did. I’ve had it for a week now and works 100%. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Maria P.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, cheaply constructed.
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. This was extremely expensive and the heating elements on the inside are cheap. Inconsistent toasting each and every time. I was battling cancer when I bought this and honestly couldn’t be bothered to return it. Underwhelmed.
customer_reviews.author: humble radish

customer_reviews.title: Quality and design +
customer_reviews.text: If a toaster can be beautiful, it is this one. Simple and sleek and a lovely finish. You definitely need the low setting for light brown toast but toasts evenly brown with a crunchy texture. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster, nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Great toaster, nice quality, works well. For anyone confused by the various photos around the web, the toaster is definitely light/retro green, not aqua. It's big!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful toaster!
customer_reviews.text: This SMEG toaster is absolutely beautiful. Simple style but stunning at the same time. The cream color is so nice. Very easy to use. A no mess no fuss small appliance. Works well for me as I appreciate simplicity.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy O.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Words cannot describe how much I love this toaster - a perfect combination of form and function. It's gorgeous and makes perfect toast. It's the priciest thing in my kitchen, but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Forsyth

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a new toaster(paid for new) as a new year’s gift to my girlfriend, but it came used, with pieces of bread inside and the instructions were from a coffee machine, completely ruined my new year’s day
customer_reviews.author: Eugeniu Zubco

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically beautiful and toasts perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful toaster!! Toasts everything to perfection... toast, waffles, pancakes, bagels, etc.
customer_reviews.author: catherine totten

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toaster, and it looks snazzy in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Toasts a variety of products. Looks perfect in my modern home.
customer_reviews.author: chris morrow

customer_reviews.title: Amazing toaster. Cooks very well
customer_reviews.text: Amazing toaster. Cooks very well. We keep it on the setting "2" sometimes "2.5" depending on the thickness of the bread. Keep in mind on how quickly it'll toast your bread!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa markus

customer_reviews.title: but it is pretty, even though my friends make fun of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Toast takes forever to toast. Toast flies out of toaster, sometimes landing on the floor. Not worth the money, but it is pretty, even though my friends make fun of the name...guess why.
customer_reviews.author: Ann L.

customer_reviews.title: Showcase toaster
customer_reviews.text: Great retro style and you can feel the quality of construction. A premium product well worth the premium price.
customer_reviews.author: forsyda

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments on this every time someone is over. It is a great product. I’m really glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip and Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Would love to understand why applainces colors dont match
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy, the color of the toaster dies not match the other smeg retro appliances I have at home, all bought as Cream!
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: It's worth every $ & It sets my counter out
customer_reviews.text: Intense view & colorful artistic style... Beautiful kitchen toaster everyone loves it
customer_reviews.author: Craig Greene

customer_reviews.title: Best toaster ever
customer_reviews.text: Was not a big toast person but wanted the best toaster i could find and after the reviews got one and its awesome solid, super even toasting , money well spent
customer_reviews.author: mike kober

customer_reviews.title: The product design makes this product special
customer_reviews.text: This toaster operates just like other toasters but it brightens up the kitchen with its sleek Italian design.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Brashear

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have a SMEG...
customer_reviews.text: Remodeled our kitchen and our Smeg gets all the compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce D Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Smeg toaster - worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great toaster, purchased it over 3 years ago with Zero issues. It's used at least 5 times a week so mine has taken a beating and it still toast & looks perfect! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: L Lumpkin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Toaster.
customer_reviews.text: This toaster was bought by wife for its decorative appeal. So, I rated it high. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ken C

customer_reviews.title: Favorite thing in my kitchen besides the kitchen aid
customer_reviews.text: Its kitchen eye candy and works well. Even toasting and has a setting for one-side toasting for bagels.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Love how it looks and toasts well although I'm still ...
customer_reviews.text: Love how it looks and toasts well although I'm still working on right level for each kind of bread - sometimes pops up too high, sometimes not at all
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Great roasting capability at lower settings
customer_reviews.text: Superb engineering. Great roasting capability at lower settings. Excellent product. My wife thinks I'm a genius for this birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Lund

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking n a real worker bee in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Love that different thicknesses if breadstuffs fit and love the toastiness of them all. And it looks really great on my counter. A piece of functioning art!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Labach

customer_reviews.title: Best toaster of all time!
customer_reviews.text: You wouldn't think a toaster would matter much in the quality of your toast, but this one makes the best toast ever!
customer_reviews.author: thadman

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Didn't want to pay this much for a toaster but tired of "name brands" selling products based on reputation versus quality. The SMEG has everything I'm looking for: high quality, craftsmanship and functional. Just pushing down on the heavy-duty lever gives me satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Steen

customer_reviews.title: The most perfect toaster in the world!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! It's simple and easy to use. I can toast bagels or toast a frozen waffle. My bread is evenly toasted and perfect! Love this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: L Steele

customer_reviews.title: Really cute, good price!
customer_reviews.text: Cutest toaster ever!! I love the mint green color! Can't wait to get the other small appliances,to match.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... reason to buy this toaster is that it is beautiful. But it also works so well
customer_reviews.text: The reason to buy this toaster is that it is beautiful. But it also works so well. I love that you can adjust settings on a simple number scale, and just walk away and let the toaster do its thing.
customer_reviews.author: L. Janssen

customer_reviews.title: After 2 months of use, one side of my ...
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months of use, one side of my toast is under-toasted and the other side is burned! So frustrating! Form over function, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Kjerstin Gruys

customer_reviews.title: Even toasting and beautiful toaster!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this toaster! My last toaster was fairly pricey and did not toast evenly. This one toasts perfectly! I love the retro look and the pastel green color. It's very good quality and looks awesome! It's quite large and I do need to turn it diagonally to fit in my appliance garage on the counter, but that's no big deal. I highly recommend this appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie L Jones

customer_reviews.title: BEST TOASTER IN THE WORLD!
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster. From the construct to the function. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Gail O.

customer_reviews.title: An Absolutely Gorgeous Device
customer_reviews.text: Smeg appliances are absolute pieces of art. It feels so good to walk into your kitchen, and be able to see one of these stunning devices displayed on your counter.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Phillips

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Most elegant toaster I ever seem, easy to use and clean, 6 star
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I love my adorable toaster! Totally worth the money! It sits on my counter and it looks so pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Definitely an impulse buy, this toaster is the classiest ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely an impulse buy, this toaster is the classiest item in my apartment. I don't even own a couch, but now eat toast fit for royalty.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O'Riley

customer_reviews.title: Great accent
customer_reviews.text: I love Smeg Retro Collection. Very good accent for my white kitchen. Product came on time, been using it for a while and had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The BEST toaster I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations! This toaster is very well made..."solid" the word I'm looking for? It makes prefect toast and looks great doing it! It makes my kitchen counter look very retro..plus, it goes well with my '50 style red chrome dinette. Love this beast!
customer_reviews.author: Karen K Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Truly the best toaster I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful toaster that works really well. Looks awesome on my kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Not only is this a good looking toaster
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this a good looking toaster, it makes great toast! The slots are big enough to toast bagels. Options include a button to toast only one side of the bread as well an another to give it an extra bit of toasting if it came out too pale. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Motolinia

customer_reviews.title: Tiadter
customer_reviews.text: Luxury toaster looks so pretty on the counter. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The wife loves her toaster and I love the way it does my English muffins
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Great design, better toast
customer_reviews.text: Sweet color, sleek design and great toasting abilities. It is a splurge but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Townley

customer_reviews.title: Costly but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Works better than any other toaster we have ever had. It sure is beautiful too.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin V. Casa

customer_reviews.title: Mixed review
customer_reviews.text: Bread browning is not evenly spread. The setting numbers are hard to red being tiny and do not stand out on a silver wheel. The product is attractive.
customer_reviews.author: William Snell

customer_reviews.title: I love my toaster!
customer_reviews.text: This toaster works perfectly. The color and style are dreamy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gerow

customer_reviews.title: Best toaster
customer_reviews.text: Such a great quality product. Works amazingly. So smooth and easy. Makes perfect toast. In terms of toasters, it’s a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: This toaster works very well and it is beautifully constructed. It is solid
customer_reviews.text: This toaster works very well and it is beautifully constructed. It is solid, the crumb tray ejects easily, the dials/controls operate nicely and it is an attractive addition to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Dorfman

customer_reviews.title: Who knew toast could be so stylish...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on the counter, but better yet it makes great toast. Keep the setting lower than expected unless you want really dark toast. Looking for other Smeg products to buy.
customer_reviews.author: JCTP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does its job and looks great. Pricey, but is excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Smeg TSF01PGUS 50's Retro Style Aesthetic 2 Slice Toaster, Pastel Green
product_meta.description: Color:Pastel GreenSmeg 50's retro style appliances will add a pop to any kitchen! With a powder coated steel body, polished chrome base, stainless steel ball lever knob and backlit chrome knob, Smeg toasters are made to last and will never go out of style.
feature_bullets: 2 extra wide slots with self-centering racks
6 browning levels and 3 pre-set programs: reheat, defrost, bagel
